data.name: Paradise Screens - Pool and Patio Enclosures

reviews.text: Paradise Screens - Pool and Patio Enclosures 201 Pritchard Ln, Brock, TX 76087 Can you envision it? We can screen it! Our aluminum-framed screen lanais are designed for durability and minimal maintenance. We carry motorized shades, screen patios and much more!
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.

"Support local small businesses- Price is reasonable and owner is professional." "My customer and I were extremely happy with the outcome." "Pricing amazing, time to complete the job amazing, quality of work amazing."

Great company and nothing but 100% quality products and installation.  Had 3 motorized screens installed on my patio and they turn out great.  Micah and his team are fabulous to work with, and I would highly recommend if in the market for patio screens.

I could not be happier with Paradise screens, Micah went above and beyond in every way from scheduling, design, construction and then cleanup they exceeded all of our expectations! They are very professional, knowledgeable and hard working. … More

I would absolutely recommend Micah and Paradise Screens to any and everybody that is desiring to turn their space into a bug free, much more enjoyable paradise. I'll first start with his presentation, I interviewed at least 4 different … More
